title: Puthu Mazhai (Delulu) Song Lyrics Tamil | Sarvam Maya

sections.intro: Experience the ethereal magic of Puthu Mazhai from the movie Sarvam Maya, a track that has captured hearts with its 'delulu' aesthetic. Composed by Justin Varghese and soulfully rendered by Shakthisree Gopalan, this song is a dreamy journey through love and longing. Dive into the full lyrics below.
sections.easterEgg:

  • This song became a massive viral hit on Instagram Reels, dubbed as the 'Delulu Song' due to its dreamy, imaginative atmosphere.
  • Shakthisree Gopalan's breathy vocal delivery was intentionally mixed to sound like a whisper, enhancing the internal monologue feel of the song
sections.faq:
Frequently Asked Questions

What movie is Puthu Mazhai from?

It is from the movie 'Sarvam Maya', starring Nivin Pauly and Riya Shibu.

Who is the music director for Puthu Mazhai?

The music is composed by Justin Varghese, known for his unique melodic arrangements.

englishStanzas:
Puthu mazhai veelnthatho unnaal Aruginil amarntha antha iravil Ithayame oru nilaa nathi

[Did a fresh rain fall because of you? On that night when you sat beside me, my heart became a river of moonlight.]

Siragugal mella virithatho Sirippu mani maalai korthatho Niraiyutho manam thaane

[Did wings slowly spread open? Was a garland of smiles woven? My heart fills up on its own.]

Vaa povom kaanatha thoorangal Irandum saayam thodum megamaai Puthiya paathaiyil sentridalaam

[Come, let's go to unseen distances; like clouds where colors blend, let us travel on new paths.]

Entha vaanam pirinthatho Veelntha oru thaaragaye Naan theda vendiyathu yaarai meendum

[Which sky was separated? Oh fallen star, who is it that I must search for again?]

Paathaigal ariyaathu intrum Koodu sera oru mogam Unnai en kannil kandathaal

[Even today, without knowing the paths, there is a longing to return to the nest because I saw you in my eyes.]
